author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fevertree Drinks Sees ‍Full Year Revenue To Be About 169 Mln Pounds
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Fevertree Drinks Plc:
* FULL YEAR REVENUE EXPECTED TO BE CIRCA £169 MILLION​ * ‍SALES IN SECOND HALF EXPECTED TO BE AHEAD OF PRIOR YEAR PERIOD BY 58%​
* ‍EXPECTS THAT OUTCOME FOR FULL YEAR WILL BE COMFORTABLY AHEAD OF MARKET EXPECTATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
